citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
During inspection, no records of semi-annual facility inspections, program reviews or reports to the IO were available
since the last inspection in April 2024. Facility held an Institutional Animal Care & Use Committee meeting in late April of
2024, but those records were compromised in a cyber attack and were unrecoverable. Facility identified that they had also
missed the October 2024 meeting and convened an emergency meeting of the IACUC to discuss the oversight and how
to address the issue in February 2025. During this time, there has been no regulated activity or covered species at the
facility.
Correct before conducting regulated activity, at the latest 30 April 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with IACUC representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
During inspection, no records of semi-annual facility inspections, program reviews or reports to the IO were available 
since the last inspection in April 2024. Facility held an Institutional Animal Care & Use Committee meeting in late April of 
2024, but those records were compromised in a cyber attack and were unrecoverable. Facility identified that they had also 
missed the October 2024 meeting and convened an emergency meeting of the IACUC to discuss the oversight and how 
to address the issue in February 2025. During this time, there has been no regulated activity or covered species at the 
facility. 
 
Correct before conducting regulated activity, at the latest 30 April 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with IACUC representative. 
 
 n
